why_choose: Why choose this course? Work Integrated Program Immersive Curriculum and Pedagogy Hands-on Learning Experience Paid Internship from 2 nd year Personalized mentoring Attractive Placement
what_learn: What you will learn? Gain hands-on exposure to real-world projects, simulating industry scenarios in computer science and systems engineering. Develop essential technical proficiencies through coding, debugging, system design, and software deployment practices. Learn cutting-edge technologies and frameworks to align with the evolving demands of the IT industry. Receive guidance from industry experts while enhancing teamwork, communication, and problem-solving abilities.
modules: Modules Year 1 Basic Sciences Holistic Education Technical English Skills Problem-solving using Programming Back-end Web Development Databases and Full Stack Web Development Year 2 Core Computation Knowledge Economics, Politics and Rural Society Development Essence of Indian Knowledge Tradition Operating Systems DBMS, Data Structure Integrated work with a partner company Year 3 Formal Language & Automata Theory Design & Analysis of Algorithms Computer Organization & Architecture Compiler Design Integrated work with a partner company Computer Networks Year 4 Academic Elective Skilling Elective Integrated work with a partner company
career: Career prospects The work-integrated course equips you with the technical expertise and practical experience needed to excel as a top-tier computer science and systems engineering professional. With industry-aligned training and hands-on projects, the program accelerates your growth, preparing you for high-demand roles in record time Immerse yourself in real-world scenarios where you solve complex problems, bridging the gap between theoretical knowledge and practical implementation. Master cutting-edge tools, frameworks, and methodologies that are pivotal in the rapidly evolving tech landscape Benefit from expert guidance to refine your communication, teamwork, and leadership skills, essential for a successful career. Graduate with confidence, armed with the skills, experience, and knowledge to thrive in competitive tech roles from day one.
